original:
Research into the long-term survival of life on Earth encompasses various aspects, including biodiversity, climate change, human impact, and astrobiology.

Scientists are investigating how biodiversity—the variety of life forms and their interactions—contributes to the resilience of ecosystems. This research focuses on the ability of ecosystems to recover from disturbances, such as natural disasters or human activities. Understanding th
